items: Start in a tabletop position with your hands and knees on the ground.
Bring your knees out wide and bring your big toes together to touch.
Sit back onto your heels and reach your arms out in front of you.
Slowly rock forward onto your hands and lift your hips up towards the ceiling.
Hold for a few seconds and then rock back onto your heels.
Repeat this rocking motion for 10-15 repetitions.
Stretches the hip flexors and quadriceps
Improves flexibility in the lower body
Helps to alleviate lower back pain
Strengthens the core muscles
Improves balance and stability
Quadriceps
Hamstrings
Glutes
Hip flexors
Lower back
Rocking Frog Stretch with a Twist
Rocking Frog Stretch with Arm Reach
Rocking Frog Stretch with Leg Extension
Advanced Rocking Frog Stretch with Arm and Leg Extension
